author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Introduce HGCal V10 geometry specific Era which will introduce things specific to C8 calorimeter design

#### PR validation:

Not yet tested - with this the V10 specific layer weights will be added and then tested with changed D41 scenario

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

It is a new set of Era's and not a back porting
title: Phase2-hgx189 Add specifics for HGCal V10 geometry
